timeline.bodyText: This is repeated several times.  I suggest making a static parse function in the FeedScopedId.
timeline.author: t2gran

replies.bodyText: Added a static method convertFromConcatenatedString  in FeedScopedId for this.
replies.author: hannesj

timeline.message: Expose all ids as strings in the API
Add a utility method from converting from a string to a set of feed scoped ids
Add a utility method from converting from a string to a set of feed scoped ids

timeline.bodyText: I would call this function convertFromListOfIds or parseListOfIds. I prefer parseoverconvert`, but we already used convert for the single element version, so it should be consistent.
timeline.author: t2gran

replies.bodyText: Changed both of these to start with convert
replies.author: hannesj

timeline.message: Rename from convert to parse in FeedScopedId
